summary: The lives of three Parisians - a color-blind painter, a radio show host and a perverted photographer - intertwine and go hilariously out of control. A classic cult comedy from the 80's.
cast: Diane Bellego|Christian François|Fabrice Luchini|Ronny Coutteure|Jean-Marie Fertey|Philippe Khorsand|Claude Marcault|Alain Marguerite|Daniel Sarky|Didier Attar|Béatrice Avoine|René Bastide|Pierre Baton|Pierre Belon|Nathalie Bertheaux|Michel Bertay|André Bézu|Jorge Blanco|Bonnafet Tarbouriech|Jean-François Bonnassies|Annie Bourgoin|Murielle Bouvard|André Bourges|Claudia Bouteliere|Isabelle Cagnat|Bernard Cazassus|Michel Chalmeau|Jean-Jacques Charriere|Djemie Chene|Marie-Hélène Conte|Robert Darmel|David Gabison|Irene David|Sophie Deschaumes|Danielle Dietrich|Josiane Drouin|Isadora Ducasse|Gerard Duges|Michel Feder|Elia Gervais|Béatrice Gromb|Germaine Granat|Jeannette Granat|Dominique Hulin|Jean-Pierre Kiss|Louis Lalanne|Philippe Lamendin|France Léa|Olivier Lebeau|Daniel Léger|Florence Lesgourgues|Franca Maï|Jean-Claude Martin|Marie-Françoise Maurin|Virginie Moréno|Roger Muni|Barbara Pavlovska|Dimitri Radochevitch|André Raffard|Corinne Richardon|Christian Rochat|Yves Savel|Max Vialle|Robert Yacar|Youri Radionow
title: Zig Zag Story
